---
description:
  Use Redis instance as storage with GraphQL Mesh Redis caching strategy. Install
  @graphql-mesh/cache-redis and configure your .meshrc.yaml with your Redis instance details.
---

import { PackageCmd } from '@theguild/components'

# Redis Cache

This caching strategy will use your Redis instance as the storage.

To get started with this caching strategy, install it:

<PackageCmd packages={['@graphql-mesh/cache-redis']} />

## How to use?

```yaml filename=".meshrc.yaml"
cache:
  redis:
    host: localhost
    port: '9876' # port should be a string
    password: 'MY_SECRET_PASSWORD'
```
